alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 2:26AM PST until January 14 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...White Pine County and Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Observations show continued snowfall in parts of White Pine County leading to some instances of reduced visibility. Use caution if traveling during the nighttime and early morning hours. Snow is expected to decrease beginning Sunday morning across the area including along US-50.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
